Review Description: After watching 2 videos on how to set up your grinder and 4 tries on the machine i finally got it pouring the best coffee to date. its not noisy like others have said and its easy to maintain. i have been using it around 4 times a day although sometimes my inlaws visit for afternoon coffee and its used 2 or 3 more times than normal. no regrets so far and its worth every penny. Try lavazza super crema or espresso whole beans best tasting coffee.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: Going from super automatic to semi love it!
Review Description: Our super automatic finally broke and decided to try this Semi automatic as we didn’t want to spend 2k on new super.Really happy with this machine- Here are some pros/cons highlights:- ProsLooks beautiful on our counterGrinder works great (even with oily dark beans)Tamping works greatFrother has been flawless (I use Half and half)Price point.Cons-Water tank in the back of the unit. I need to move the machine every time I fill. On the other hand where else would I go that wouldn’t change beauty of the machine.Unit height (doesn’t quite fit under our cabinets) we have towards the front of our counter top. Still looks great.If you do use dark oily beans you will get watery soupy puck. Not huge deal.If you switch beans you will need to dial in grind and volume again.Overall we love it and would buy again. I don’t see going back to super automatic.Hope this helps.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: Takes a little practice, but well worth it!
Review Description: We got this as a gift for each other for Christmas. We LOVE it.The ONLY negative thing is it is not QUITE as simple as grind, tamp, brew. This is not your mom & dads Coffee maker (well... unless you are my kids). Make sure you set everything just right, and anything less than top shelf coffee beans will not work well, not all espresso is the same, we learned this the hard way when we decided to use up some of the "old' beans we had in the cabinet. (we thought we broke it. wouldn't brew right).However, Once you get used to it, you'll be making perfect espresso & coffee drinks every time.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: Great hybrid machine, we love it
Review Description: I used various espresso machines: a manual Gaggia Classic, a manual Delonghi and several fully-automatic ones from Delonghi and Siemens. There were two issues with the manual espresso machines: 1) The whole kitchen got messy no matter how often we cleaned 2) To get a consistent espresso shot in the morning rush was too difficult. Fully automatic ones were very convenient and kept our countertop clean, however they lacked flavor no matter what we tried. This Delonghi is a good hybrid. It is very easy to get consistent shots and our countertop stays clean. The machine will adjust the amount/granularity of the grind and will produce consistent shots. No learning curve. Highly recommended

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: I've walked into my kitchen several times to water pouring onto my floor from this machine. Don't waste your time / money on this.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: We purchased this espresso maker on Nov 7, 2019 and returned it on the 11th of Dec.  There were a few disappointments from the start, but we most likely would have accepted them, but when it started to leak all over my counter top, we returned it. We checked it over and made sure that the seal from the water dispenser was making contact, but it still leaked. Now for the disappointments. Although we had the grind value down to the very lowest, we could not get the pressure gauge to read in the acceptable area. The taste wasn't bad tho and the crema was pretty good. It was also good at making an Americano which my husband likes. One thing that really bugged me was the the milk steam only runs for one minute and then quits. The only way I could get the temperature up to 140 was by resetting the steam. It did froth well, but I never did get a hot latte.  The automatic tamper worked so well that it was almost impossible to get the used grinds out of it. Forget using the Knock Box. Also the cup warming feature is useless. We have since bought a Breville Barista Express machine and although it is certainly messier and cheaper I might ad,  so far I am very pleased with it.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description:
The media could not be loaded.
                




   I'm extremely satisfied with this product. It's so elegant, easy to use, and the perfect espresso machine for starters like me. It's my first espresso machine, I was using Moka pot before. I truly liked its design. And I truly like the Smart Tamping system - not perfect tamping but quite good one for such a convenient mechanism. And it wouldn't hurt Delonghi to send it with an espresso cup set :)Note: I might consider buying the newer version aka 9355 since the frother is not working as I expected, I would prefer to have a manual version. Because it's hard to clean this one and sometimes their prices are very close.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: Paid for itself. Excellent espresso machine.
Review Description: This is what I have been looking for. I can make coffee in several ways with ease. They are consistently good. It is a lovely ritual. I grind the coffee beans, tamp, then brew. I froth my milk and add it to the coffee.I was hesitant to spend this much money on a coffee machine. I don’t often buy coffee at a specialty store, though I appreciate a good vanilla latte. I usually consume 2 cups of coffee a day. If I were to pay $5 per cup, at 2 cups a day, this machine pays for itself in two months.I am very happy with this machine.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: Had been using a Breville Infuser machine until it expired.  This is the next level up in terms of features.  Bought it at a discount from the Amazon Warehouse with "minor cosmetic damage".  In this case it was a difficult to see small dent in the drip tray, so I consider it an excellent purchasing choice.The machine itself is simple to use.  I haven't quite got the combination of beans, grind and tamping pressure to where I want it - I think mostly the beans - but there is still time.Overall very please with my purchase.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: Yes, but can it make coffee?
Review Description: Yes, it can!  Great machine.  A tad smaller footprint than I expected, but solid and well made.  Stainless exterior. Relatively easy to use (my first foray into this type of machine).  A lot of online videos really simplifies the learning.  Saw videos comparing this to the "B" brand.  I would still buy this.  For me, there are enough settings on here to really personalize the drinking experience, yet enough built-in/automatic settings so one does not need to became an expert barista.  For the math addicts, netting out coffee bean purchases against not buying k-cups, this machine will pay for itself (for me) in less than two (2) years.  Plus, there will still be over 1 year left of the 3-year warranty!  Impressive machine.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: Not for someone who already has a quality grinder.  The port filter is a non-standard size, so normal tampers don't work.  The auto tamper over tamps even with the lightest pressure, so the pump struggles to get water through the grind.  By the tie a cup is drawn, it's cold.  Crema is weak, coffee doesn't taste very goo.  We are very experienced barisatas and have experimented with the settings.  We're trying to find a machine for our guest house and so far, nothing comes close to the quality and features of our Breville Dual Boiler.  Returning this one asap.  Next up:  Rancillo.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: Good product but find a different seller, due to warranty issues, WITH UPDATE.
Review Description: Keep looking, don't get anything from this company or this seller. Here's why, or at least here's what happened to me. Within two months of getting this very nice, very expensive machine, the grinder stopped working. I tried to get a replacement from DeLonghi, but DeLonghi doesn't recognize this seller as an official retailer so they wouldn't honor my request for a replacement piece. The seller would replace or refund if I would mail them the machine back, which would have been super expensive. The machine is obviously heavy. At the time, I chose to live with the machine since it was still half working. Today, the entire machine stopped working. It turns on but won't do anything else. All of its functions have ceased to work. So, DeLonghi machines, no matter who you buy them from, are lemons. At least mine is. DeLonghi, the company, won't stand by their manufacturing. The seller here would not make refunds or replacements realistic and absolutely not easy. Amazon is at fault here too, in my opinion. They should not let unauthorized sellers sell anything that would jeopardize a return,  refund, or warranty. At all. Ever. That's just shady. I hope you find a great espresso machine from a reputable company.  My DeLonghi was great while it lasted but I'd never spend a dime on something that didn't even last 10 months. Good luck. UPDATE: One day after posting this review, I was contacted by DeLonghi and was told that they would indeed honor the warranty.  They provided me with a packing box and packing slip (at their expense) to ship my broken machine off to be repaired. Which it was!!! The machine was repaired and returned to me. I love my machine and the coffees it makes. I kinda wish they would have honored the warranty the first go-round, but at the end of the day, I am glad DeLonghi did the right thing.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: nightmare to set up and defective
Review Description: I purchased this expresso machine and was excited as i read many reviews as well as many videos on which unit to buy. i spent 3 and half hours trying to set this machine up after watching the youtube vieo on how to set this unit up i had to call there customer service agents and spoke to one agent who kept telling this part must be defective when it wasnt there just wanting a good explanation on how to probably install the hopper plazstic peiece that set in the grinder but the real problem was the little piece inside the grinder part of the hopper that wouldnt lock in which caused the whole machine to not work at all.. what a joke this is a brand new unit and comes defective. such a waste of time and energy. thank goodness for amazon return.my husband was dignosed with Cancer two days before christmas so it took time to focus on even trying to set this machine up. i will be returning this today. such a disappointment

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: The coffee created is amazing!! The crema produced is heaven. I enjoy the coffee as much as any cafe I’ve been to, and I do it myself. I usually do the Americano them foam some sweetened creamer and mix it in. Heaven!!Here’s the cons...a couple times the porta filter has caused the pump not to work. Even with regular cleaning, the microscopic drain hole can get clogged which will back up the pump and not allow the hot water to come through.  Delonghi sent me another filter and it worked for awhile... then backed up again...I scrubbed the filter vigorously and it’s working again. I’m hoping that’s the only issue and that this machine lasts a decade or more because the coffee produced is to die for.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: This is a gift for a family member
Review Description: I received my expresso machine yesterday seems to work great have a little bit of a problem with water leaking around the basket but  I think it’s because it’s new and maybe the basket needs to seat I purchased one before and had to return it but I’m happy with this I will update in a week or so it’s going to my daughter as a gift

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: LOVE IT!!! Easy to learn and great results. Best Christmas present ever. Hubby very happy.
Review Description: The start manual was easy to understand with lots of pictures. I got Blue Mountain Jamaican Coffee Beans to try it with as we love a good espresso in Jamaica. SO bringing home that was awesome in the ability to make the espresso. If youre thinking about buying an espresso machine this one was very beginner friendly.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: returned 2 that were clearly used, gave up after that...
Review Description: Hard for me to know what this is really like, I ordered the first a few weeks ago and it arrived in clearly used form. It had coffee stains on parts of it. Fair enough, it happens. I sent it back and re-ordered and the second one was also used with coffee stains on it. I'm guessing that this product has a high return rate. My wife at this point refuses to take a chance on another - she's now convinced it will break quickly and parts will probably be hard to source. A shame, I really like the look...

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: Average daily use has been 2-4 cups. Never had any issues with it but keeping things clean and tidy. Hope it lasts for few more years.One thing to note: coffee type selector knob is becoming somewhat loose over time. No issues but I was hoping for better quality components especially for something that could be used very often and adds to the overall tactile feel.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: Writing this review after over a couple of weeks use of this espresso machine and loving it so far! First off, I really like the looks of this machine. It's definitely the centerpiece of the countertop. Guests will notice!Next is the coffee making experience, I was a novice, my expertise was basically watching a few youtube videos on how to use this machine. Delonghi has a playlist on youtube which i found very useful. I found it very easy to use, but it has enough settings where you can play around and figure out what works best for the coffee beans you buy.And last the actual coffee... yumm!!! Perfect! The only downside is that your friends and family are going to ask you to make cappuccinos all the time!

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: Two machines with quality issues + terrible “Customer Support”
Review Description: The first machine would never reach “Optimal Zone” pressure level, and after an hour ON HOLD with DeLonghi, they instructed me to return to them for repair...this after they watched a video of the machine operating.  Since they estimated up to 10 days door-to-door to get repaired, I asked why would I do that when I can return unit to Amazon for a replacement and have a new one in 1-2 days.  They agreed.Fact of the matter, the CS person didn’t know how to trouble shoot this problem...She never asked abut fineness of grind, volume of grind, or whether 1 or 2 shots.  When I researched further on-line, I decided to try double shot, and viola!...it got right in the Optimal Zone.The second machine that then came in as a replacement for the first never would get out of the rinse cycle, which is a part of the machine start-up.  No lights or buttons working other than the Rinse button.  Of course, based on my first experience, I had no interest in calling DeLonghi’s so-called “Customer Support.”

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: Was sent a used machine! sending it back!! Really disappointing!

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: Great machine for an introduction into Espresso
Review Description: Love the built in tamping, and  high quality grinder. Easy to use and tons of flavor. After watching hours of reviews from youtube channels decided to go for the La Specialista. There is not as much customizing available as with the next tier/price point but for the under 800 mark this is a very high quality machine! have had it for over a month and have  been using it daily, had to descale it once but directions were easy to follow. The Knock box is a must. Would definitely purchase this machine again!

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: Love this machine. No issues. Some minor things. First RTFM1, Grind amount selector is sensitive. So turn in small increments2, Use the water hardness test strip. If you got really hard water use the optional filter3 Steamer wand is hot. Be carefulI’d say it’s a good buy. I’d buy it again

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: What a fantastic piece of machinery. We needed a new coffee machine and not only did this one have all the bells and whistles, it lived up to expectations. Every morning is a pleasure using it. This coffee machine does everything. The look is very sleek and the thing that stands out most is it's multifunction. Coffee, tea, cappuccino, espresso etc, it does everything. I definitely recommend it.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: This is my 5th month of purchasing this machine. It was super convenient and made really great coffee at the very beginning, but several weeks ago the descale light was shining for no reason and no matter how many times I descaled it. Eventually I contacted the product service they helped me to fix that problem through live stream service. Few days ago my machine broke down again, it was the drip tray problem this time. I already put back the drip tray correctly and nicely but the drip tray light just kept shining. I contacted the product service again and they asked me to return my machine to them to see what's the problem with it. I am very disappointed after these two times of disfunction.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: Machine was a "lemon" and DeLonghi did not replace it!
Review Description: I bought machine at the end of August, 2020. Everything worked fine until mid-December when the first error message appeared on the display. Over the course of two months I had to send the machine to DeLonghi for repair TWICE and the machine still did not work! Out of the 6 months we owned the machine, it was either at DeLonghi for service or not working for over 2 months! I paid $861 for this “PREMIUM” machine and was hardly able to use it. I AM VERY UNHAPPY WITH DELONGHI CUSTOMER SERVICE. BUYER BEWARE!!!!!!!!!

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: Do not buy this item, Buyer beware!
Review Description: After 5 months this machine quit working and De'Longhi will not warrant thier product. They finally warranted this unit after I had reached out to a great person inside the company (I don't think she even works in the customer service dept.) and she sent me a new one (at least they told me it was a new one, I still think is was refurbished!)  This second one only lasted 3 months and quit frothing.... Between the 2 units, I only had them for a total of 8 months and they both are paperweights.What a wast of money!

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: I am mostly satisfied with this espresso machine on the ease of grinding and tamping. The espresso pump works well and heats up water quickly.One item that isn’t covered in the manual is a chute cover that opens for cleaning. It mentions “cleaning the coffee guide” but has no mention or illustration of the opening in the picture I attached. There is a sensor in there and if it’s block with grounds the grinder will not start. Seems like important information to cover in the manual.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: New machine, Only warranty option was to send it in a be without coffee maker for a month
Review Description: Machine is 20 days old it was stuck in the descaling option. Called customer service line for me my only option with the sand in the machine and be without a coffee maker for probably about a month or so. For New  machine unacceptable customer service

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: Be patient, read the instructions, look at YouTube videos!!
Review Description: It took a while, and I still have a way to go to get it "perfect", but all in all, this is a great machine. It gets me out of bed in the morning thinking about that wonderful cup of espresso with the thick foamy milk on top that will soon be in front of me. It makes me smile just thinking about it.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: The machine did not draw water upon operating.  We spent a great deal of time on phone with manufacturer DeLonghi and they assured us we were doing everything correct and we should return to retailer.  I processed the return as an exchange.  We have heard nothing from Amazon and I feel like I should have purchased through a more reputable distributor like William Sonoma.  I would like to know the status of my return and know if a replacement machine has been shipped.  I could have reordered this product and had it delivered by now.  This process began 2/17/22

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: Nice machine but noisy; hot water dispenser and frothing wand are messy
Review Description: We've had the machine for a few months and really enjoy the flavor and quality of the coffee drinks that we can make.  Our only complaints:1) the pump for the extraction process started squealing for a few seconds at startup; started doing this 1-2 weeks after we started using it;2) the hot water dispenser seems to be a pulse-type pump and sends short bursts of hot water into the cup for making coffees or teas;  once the cup starts getting full, the beverage splashes out of the cup until the dispenser is turned off.3) the frothing wand operates much the same way - if not careful, the spurting steam can splash hot liquid on your hand.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: Great coffee maker / Terrible espresso machine
Review Description: This is a great coffee maker is your Mr. coffee drip pot fails. But if you want a nice cup of espresso then go to your local coffee shop. The machine does not make a proper cup of an espresso, I have been making espresso and roasting my own beans for years. Also fault in the machine is that every time you make a cup of coffee water leaks out of the bottom. Read multiple reviews on how to fix this and I would have to go buy a piece. I own this espresso machine for less than one week and I’m not about to go buy something else to fix a brand new machine.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: Purchased this machine around a month ago and so far so good. The machine works as advertised and it is less messy than other brands at same price point where you need to use a manual tamper. Makes great cappuccino and espresso and so far I am very happy with my purchase. At the beginning we were struggling to build up the pressure to the optimum zone, but after changing the beans, I am getting perfect pressure consistently. Definitely recommend it to everyone.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: Amazing but broke after 6 months. See edit.
Review Description: This machine undoubtedly makes the very best espresso coffee I have ever tasted. The problem is that the machine is very likely to break down and it will cost you a lot of time, money and effort to get it periodically repaired.The integrated grinder stopped working after only 6 months. I now realize that the machine looks amazing on the outside but the manufacturing and engineering quality of the components inside is poor. So if you are willing to spend $700 for a great espresso machine be prepared to spend a lot more regularly to keep it running. It’s a shame because it should be awesome and reliable given the high cost.Added info! So I replaced it with the Gevi Gecme403-u which costs $99.00. It is amazing with lots of crema. Just buy a separate grinder.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: Returned Because the grinder doesn’t go fine enough
Review Description: Let me start out by saying this is a beautiful machine with great design BUT the grinder does not let you go to a true espresso corse level. If you plan on making espresso out of only a pressurized filter that’s great but what’s the point of putting in a high end burr grinder if you don’t let it flourish 6 settings really and another thing that makes me very upset for a machine of this caliber and price it needs to include a non pressurized filter period end of story. I returned this machine and purchased the breville barista express.... its to bad cause that autotamping station was so nice  and clean and the machine again looked better then the barista or even then the Silvia

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: Bought this in JUNE - its quit.  Got notification to Descale so set it up to do it - the thing would not stop sending water and making noises.  Finally turned off power in back and unplugged.  Now the descale light stays on with the emergency triangle and wont work at all.  Called DeLongi and will have to send unit in for repair but in the interim I had to buy another smaller espresso machine which works 10 times better at 2/3 the cost!!

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: I bought this for my husband in November 2020. It is now March 2021. It's made 1-3 cups of coffee every day since purchase, and has given wonderful results. My husband, the coffee snob, has really enjoyed it.But then it broke. Condensation collected in the pressure window, and even when unplugged, the pressure needle is stuck at optimal zone. The machine is un-useable.It was a really good buy, and I'll adjust my review if customer service comes thru and resolves the issue. Will update later.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: Love this machine,My wife and I have about 4cups each per day.I was very surprised at how quiet this Machine is compared to my old one I had.It also steams the milk in no time.Also the heat up time on this machine is pretty much non existent, by the time the beans are ground the machine is ready to brew.In the beginning i was worried since there are some not so great reviews but I figured that it has a 3 year warranty, for myself I figure even if it only lasts 3 years that it will still be worth every penny with the amount of coffee I drink, it is still a lot cheaper than getting coffee out.Pros:Ease of useBean grinderVery solid feelVery impressed on how easy it is to clean the wand (compared to my older machine)3 year warrantyCons:Can’t remove coffee bean hopper unless empty ( you can remove it but you will spill beans everywhere)Water tank should be a little larger (doesn’t hold a lot of water)I am very pleased with my purchase

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: Good Expresso maker for home use.
Review Description: After using this machine for a month, here are some of my thoughts on the product:- I can not get the pressure of extraction rise up to the middle or higher end of the “optimum zone” even with the finest grinding setting.  The only way I can get higher pressure is to fill portfilter to a level slightly higher than the horizontal line but, if you filled it too high you won’t be able to close it.- The Drip tray fills up very quickly and you need to remember to empty it or you will have water on your counter.  There is a rubber floater that is supposed to indicate high water level but it was not discussed in the manual.- The perforated screen inside the portfilter should be pulled out for cleaning but it is difficult  to remove.-  overall the machine is easy to use with all the indicators in the front panel.  It is nice that you don’t need separate grinder and tamper which saves a lot of counter space. Making Expresso is easy but  I am still working on my latte skills.  Sometimes I get a blob of foam on the top and other times I get no foams.A note after two months of use:  I am really happy with the purchase I made.  The expresso taste very good after I adjusted the water temperature to high and the double walled glass helps keep the drink hot longer.  Fixed a cup of latte macchiato every morning to start my day off.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: Makes a great latte, Americano or cappuccino but has limitations.This is from Delonghi:  Please be advised any Delonghi espresso units do not work with non-pressurized baskets. We have designed and tested them to run only with pressurized baskets, even the La Specialista.Works well as designed.  Good milk frothing.Limited by the grinder fineness.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: This product gives me mixed feelings weekly.Pros: Easy to use, good shots, good Americanos.Cons: Every week or two, inexplicably, without warning, the thing completely empties its water reservoir onto my countertop, into the drawers, on the floor, everywhere. You’ll walk up to the machine and notice that everything is wet, the reservoir is empty, the water collection tray is overflowed. No noise, no other issues, just every now and then, it floods your kitchen.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: This machine is quite an investment, but it is a great looking machine that brews consistent delicious espresso shots (and more) very quickly and very cleanly (thanks to the built in grinder and tamper). It takes a few cups to get the grind and quantity settings just right, but after that it's very quick and easy to use.It is a large machine (I have to remove the lid from the bean hopper to be able to slide it out from under my kitchen cabinets to refill the water reservoir) so make sure you take note of the dimensions.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: So far so good.  I've only had this machine for a couple weeks.
Review Description: So far so good.  I've only had this machine for a couple weeks but I like it!  It was a bit complicated to me to figure out how to use it at first, but once I did, it's very easy to use.  I just watched some YouTube videos and figured it out pretty quickly!

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: I bought this as a Father’s Day gift for my husband. The best gift ever since I get to use it too! Haha We love our de’longhi coffee maker! It wasn’t easy to figure out how to use it, we had to read the manual a few times, but once we figured it out and got all the settings where we want them it’s a quick cup of coffee every morning. I love how clean it is! There is no mess! The all in one grinder and tamper makes it so easy and mess free! Highly recommend this amazing machine!

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: We moved from Oregon to the east coast and went into bad coffee shock. They actually think Dunkin is a palatable morning drink. Then Starbucks is literally your only other option. I was in coffee hell. Then after adding what my husband and I spend in a year on espresso it made sense to just buy a decent machine and make our own. We went with this one due to cost and abilities. I could not be happier with this purchase, I had read a review that said to make sure and buy to go cups, lids, straws, flavors, milk, and I went one more step and got clear glass espresso cups that are perfect to see your beautiful finished delicious espresso. I like white chocolate powder as well as syrup so I bought both. Everything arrived on the same day so I was making my espresso in less than 30 min of its arrival. I LOVE this machine.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: I purchased this on Black Friday weekend as a Christmas gift for my wife. When my wife opened it on Christmas, numerous items were missing and it could not be used. I have since been in contact with DeLonghi to fix this and they've been sporadic in keeping me apprised of what is going on. I am suspicious this package had already been opened and wonder if it was returned to Amazon, thrown back in the box and resold. Not sure if fault lies with Amazon, DeLonghi or both......regardless, this purchase has been a mistake and I strongly recommend to others to not make the same mistake as me...

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: Grinder stopped working - I followed all the direction to clean it, still nothing. The company only will work with me during business hours so I have to take a day off for them to show me how to do what I've already done - so I'm out $800 and not expresso

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: Would not accept that the product is defective.
Review Description: From the first week, we had a leaking problem and in 2 weeks, the steamer got broken and now the warning light is on. I have contacted Amazon and they just tell me to contact De'Longhi. De'Longhi has been super slow to my calls or emails and they keep telling they can troubleshoot it but still no proper guidance.  Asked for a refund as I believe it is defective. They would not admit that. Very unhappy with the service for an over 600 dollar espresso machine.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: Looks great but got an out of box failiure
Review Description: I received this machine on Sunday. Super excited, looks awesome, however when the water starts pouring it makes a screeching sound for 2 or 3 seconds, then continues normal. Everything else works perfect, the taste is awesome, I love this machine. I called DeLonghi support, very helpful people, started a video chat and they agreed that this sound is definitely not right. Since I just purchased it they asked for me to contact Amazon and have them ship a new one. Seems like an out of box failure. So that will be my next step...I will update my review once I receive my replacement machine

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: So easy to use. Easy to cleanThis was a present from my husband. I had been begging for an espresso machine and was expecting something not so fancy but I am thankful he picked this one. I plan on using it forever. Well worth the investment and is saving us a ton of money.It doesn't quite fit on our kitchen counter top since it has cabinets above so we have it on a separate table in the dining room.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: Bad bad bad equipment. Terrible customer service.
Review Description: Bought my Specialista in September 2019. The grinder is not meant for deep cleaning like the Breville does. And by deep cleaning I mean the removal of the lower burr to allow cleaning of deposits below it and dislodge and remove deposits upstream of the chute. The Breville lower burr has a nut so the lower burr removal is simple and easy. Di’ Longhi customer service is awful to say the least. I’m a 1 cup a day user. Stay away from this terrible piece of junk and its “customer support” department. Final result? Jammed grinder and no help from CS.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: Beats the espresso at local shop
Review Description: Great machine, relatively easy to set up. great espresso every time.ONLY complaint is that the coffee bean hopper is not switchable from caf to decaf. You have to have an empty hopper in order to change it. So I measure my coffee beans in the morning by the cup so I can use the machine for decaf in the evening.....

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: The first machine I ordered leaked. It also looked as if it had been used with ground beam residue in hopper. I returned it and they replaced with a new one. It also malfunctioned when the pressure gauge did not work. After two faulty machines I returned and requested a full refund. I was disappointed in the steam wand too as it did not steam with much pressure. The pros on this machine are the tamping feature with little to no mess to clean up!

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: This is a lovely items on the counter top and takes a bit of trial and error to make great coffee. We experienced some of the complaints, but nothing that would make me not purchase it again. One comment? You must clean it often if you drink a lot of coffee. It comes with one cleaning pod, get more with your purchase.  Make sure you buy the brand stuff or it warns it won't work.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: this was a Christmas gift. when it was opened it was dented had coffee grounds in it and in the box. none of the accessories were in the box. this was a used defective item not what we ordered. tried to return reorder would not let us at that time. so started the return and reordered a week later. it came it was a new item that did not work. we called manufacture they shipped us a new grinder part which solved the problem and it now works. so now im billed $811 for the first and $811 for the second one. when i check on my return status its says they will apply credit within 7 days of the return. it shipped out ups on 12/11/20. so it works good if your willing to put up with all the problems and pay for it twice.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: I am not writing a negative recommendation. Quite the opposite. But, if you are looking for exceptional taste and ease of use, you need to choose one or the other. This machine is extremely specific in its purpose and operation. This also means that you will need to take good care and proper maintenance in its use. If you do, you will LOVE IT! We are extremely satisfied with our La Specialista.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: Received it new from the box on a Saturday, broken and wont work by Friday. General Warning sign, expresso features wont work. Most annoying thing is I would normally just ask for a return and replace. Defective products happen. But amazon will not allow for a return and replace with this same product and I am not going to waste my time and money sending this product off at my own cost to be repaired by the warranty. So I am returning it and getting my refund and I intend to use my refund to purchase the comparable model of expresso machine from Breville.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: Disappointed on the quality for a brand new equipment out of the box
Review Description: No steam out of the box. I just bought it and after following instructions I get the vapor sign flashing for some minutes and then the call service red triangle simbol steady.  Coffy grinder and browser works ok

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: This is an additional brewing machine for our home.  Quality and workmanship is superior.  Very user friendly.  Worth every penny

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: If you have $800 and you want to spend 200 per month on coffee, buy this machine. I spend hours on the phone with the customer "support" and after waiting 1 month, this malfunctioning machine is still sitting idle on the countertop. It's a shame that companies are manufacturing low-quality products, charge a lot, and give ZERO support, simply because they can.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: Excellent product!  Easy to learn  to use and does a great job making espresso and lattes!  Highly recommended!  May update this later to comment on durability, but so far, this thing runs strong!

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: First machine came from Amazon with a defect. Steam wand had zero pressure and no steam. Returned to Delonghi in Jew Jersey. They sent replacement straight from factory.  Its perfect.  I dont know if amazon is selling refurbished units but given the level of quality control at Delonghi, I find it hard to believe a unit with no pressure to build steam, made it out of their factory.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: Good machine but bad after sale service.
Review Description: The product itself was good for about 2 months then it won’t work. We called de’longhi. They said it need service and will issued a box and label in one week. They have never arrived. It has been a battle just to get it ship back for a service. It is Just still There on my counter. I would say the product is good but after sale service is super sad. Think again if you will buy with this company.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: This item broke on the 3rd espresso made - I paid $722 for this. I returned the item BEFORE the date suggested & I have the claim ticket for proof. I didn't get my refund until a month AFTER I returned it, and only got $555 of the $722. Horrible! If I could give a negative on the product and the company, I would!

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: It works great.... when it works!
Review Description: We went through 2 of these in just a few months.  The first machine’s grinder stopped working and the second machine’s steam wand stopped working.  We troubleshooted and watched many videos/tutorials to try to fix the problems with no success.  We have given up.  Maybe they were defective machines or maybe the machine that does it all.. has more that can go wrong!We have now purchased a Breville instead.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: Buyer beware.  Expensive espresso machine worked for less than 60 days.  De"Longhi refuses to repair or replace because they said it came from an unapproved seller.  It came from Amazon...

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: Love this machine once I figured it out lol
Review Description: It took me a while but I figured it out and now I’m in love. So far best espresso

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: Great espresso maker, along with making a regular cup of coffee.
Review Description: Great machine, commercial grade!

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: After much research and deliberation, I got the Delonghi La Specialista. After a week of use, it was absolutely money well spent. Not only is it very easy to use, but it makes perfect espresso every time. The milk frothing is also super consistent and easy for non-baristas to use effectively. I couldn’t be more pleased with it. I only wish I ordered it sooner. Two thumbs way up!

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: Coffee grinder and frothed don’t work
Review Description: The coffee maker came with two broken features. It did not grind coffee properly (just ground coffee beans into large chunks, and never changed based on various settings, just spit out large chunks. Second, the milk frothed steamer didn’t work.Waste of money and effort trying to get it to work.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: Great machine but the squealing noise at the start of each shot is disappointing
Review Description: Support said the squealing would go away, but eight months later it hasn’t. They also said it doesn’t imply a technical problem, and that seems right. It seems it is just a known design flaw. Otherwise the machine is great, with the tamping station an ingenious way to reduce mess. The two settings on the frothing wand don’t seem to differ much, but it still works well.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: DO NOT BUY!!!!  CHEAPLY MADE, MULTIPLE THINGS BROKE WITHIN FIRST WEEK!
Review Description: DO NOT BUY!!!!!!!..HAD FOR 1 WEEK AND HAD MULTIPLE ISSUES... GRINDER BROKE INSTANTLY, ESPRESSO STOPPED WORKING,FROTHER DIDN'T WORK RIGHT... SAVE YOUR MONEY!!!!!!!

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: Thought I was a coffee pro - think again!!
Review Description: I have experience with coffee machines, but my partner does not. I chose this machine because of the pressure gauge and the self-tamping mechanism so that he could use it too. I am really glad I did, because I wasn’t as good at making coffee as I thought... I did have to learn to readjust the settings and watch the pressure gauge for each type of bean I put into it. I think with proper cleaning, this will last me years.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: This is easily the best espresso maker we have owned. It makes great espresso and other beverages, is quiet, clean and efficient. It’s not complex, in the sense that it’s not automated with a timer and auto brew, etc., it’s fairly manual, only makes one or two cups at a time, so if you want to make a pot of coffee, this Is not your machine.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: LOVE IT!!! Easy to learn and great results. Best Christmas present ever. Hubby very happy.
Review Description: The start manual was easy to understand with lots of pictures. I got Blue Mountain Jamaican Coffee Beans to try it with as we love a good espresso in Jamaica. SO bringing home that was awesome in the ability to make the espresso. If youre thinking about buying an espresso machine this one was very beginner friendly.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: returned 2 that were clearly used, gave up after that...
Review Description: Hard for me to know what this is really like, I ordered the first a few weeks ago and it arrived in clearly used form. It had coffee stains on parts of it. Fair enough, it happens. I sent it back and re-ordered and the second one was also used with coffee stains on it. I'm guessing that this product has a high return rate. My wife at this point refuses to take a chance on another - she's now convinced it will break quickly and parts will probably be hard to source. A shame, I really like the look...

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: Average daily use has been 2-4 cups. Never had any issues with it but keeping things clean and tidy. Hope it lasts for few more years.One thing to note: coffee type selector knob is becoming somewhat loose over time. No issues but I was hoping for better quality components especially for something that could be used very often and adds to the overall tactile feel.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: Writing this review after over a couple of weeks use of this espresso machine and loving it so far! First off, I really like the looks of this machine. It's definitely the centerpiece of the countertop. Guests will notice!Next is the coffee making experience, I was a novice, my expertise was basically watching a few youtube videos on how to use this machine. Delonghi has a playlist on youtube which i found very useful. I found it very easy to use, but it has enough settings where you can play around and figure out what works best for the coffee beans you buy.And last the actual coffee... yumm!!! Perfect! The only downside is that your friends and family are going to ask you to make cappuccinos all the time!

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: Two machines with quality issues + terrible “Customer Support”
Review Description: The first machine would never reach “Optimal Zone” pressure level, and after an hour ON HOLD with DeLonghi, they instructed me to return to them for repair...this after they watched a video of the machine operating.  Since they estimated up to 10 days door-to-door to get repaired, I asked why would I do that when I can return unit to Amazon for a replacement and have a new one in 1-2 days.  They agreed.Fact of the matter, the CS person didn’t know how to trouble shoot this problem...She never asked abut fineness of grind, volume of grind, or whether 1 or 2 shots.  When I researched further on-line, I decided to try double shot, and viola!...it got right in the Optimal Zone.The second machine that then came in as a replacement for the first never would get out of the rinse cycle, which is a part of the machine start-up.  No lights or buttons working other than the Rinse button.  Of course, based on my first experience, I had no interest in calling DeLonghi’s so-called “Customer Support.”

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: Was sent a used machine! sending it back!! Really disappointing!

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: Great machine for an introduction into Espresso
Review Description: Love the built in tamping, and  high quality grinder. Easy to use and tons of flavor. After watching hours of reviews from youtube channels decided to go for the La Specialista. There is not as much customizing available as with the next tier/price point but for the under 800 mark this is a very high quality machine! have had it for over a month and have  been using it daily, had to descale it once but directions were easy to follow. The Knock box is a must. Would definitely purchase this machine again!

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: Love this machine. No issues. Some minor things. First RTFM1, Grind amount selector is sensitive. So turn in small increments2, Use the water hardness test strip. If you got really hard water use the optional filter3 Steamer wand is hot. Be carefulI’d say it’s a good buy. I’d buy it again

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: What a fantastic piece of machinery. We needed a new coffee machine and not only did this one have all the bells and whistles, it lived up to expectations. Every morning is a pleasure using it. This coffee machine does everything. The look is very sleek and the thing that stands out most is it's multifunction. Coffee, tea, cappuccino, espresso etc, it does everything. I definitely recommend it.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: This is my 5th month of purchasing this machine. It was super convenient and made really great coffee at the very beginning, but several weeks ago the descale light was shining for no reason and no matter how many times I descaled it. Eventually I contacted the product service they helped me to fix that problem through live stream service. Few days ago my machine broke down again, it was the drip tray problem this time. I already put back the drip tray correctly and nicely but the drip tray light just kept shining. I contacted the product service again and they asked me to return my machine to them to see what's the problem with it. I am very disappointed after these two times of disfunction.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: Machine was a "lemon" and DeLonghi did not replace it!
Review Description: I bought machine at the end of August, 2020. Everything worked fine until mid-December when the first error message appeared on the display. Over the course of two months I had to send the machine to DeLonghi for repair TWICE and the machine still did not work! Out of the 6 months we owned the machine, it was either at DeLonghi for service or not working for over 2 months! I paid $861 for this “PREMIUM” machine and was hardly able to use it. I AM VERY UNHAPPY WITH DELONGHI CUSTOMER SERVICE. BUYER BEWARE!!!!!!!!!

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: Do not buy this item, Buyer beware!
Review Description: After 5 months this machine quit working and De'Longhi will not warrant thier product. They finally warranted this unit after I had reached out to a great person inside the company (I don't think she even works in the customer service dept.) and she sent me a new one (at least they told me it was a new one, I still think is was refurbished!)  This second one only lasted 3 months and quit frothing.... Between the 2 units, I only had them for a total of 8 months and they both are paperweights.What a wast of money!

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: I am mostly satisfied with this espresso machine on the ease of grinding and tamping. The espresso pump works well and heats up water quickly.One item that isn’t covered in the manual is a chute cover that opens for cleaning. It mentions “cleaning the coffee guide” but has no mention or illustration of the opening in the picture I attached. There is a sensor in there and if it’s block with grounds the grinder will not start. Seems like important information to cover in the manual.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: New machine, Only warranty option was to send it in a be without coffee maker for a month
Review Description: Machine is 20 days old it was stuck in the descaling option. Called customer service line for me my only option with the sand in the machine and be without a coffee maker for probably about a month or so. For New  machine unacceptable customer service

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: Be patient, read the instructions, look at YouTube videos!!
Review Description: It took a while, and I still have a way to go to get it "perfect", but all in all, this is a great machine. It gets me out of bed in the morning thinking about that wonderful cup of espresso with the thick foamy milk on top that will soon be in front of me. It makes me smile just thinking about it.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: The machine did not draw water upon operating.  We spent a great deal of time on phone with manufacturer DeLonghi and they assured us we were doing everything correct and we should return to retailer.  I processed the return as an exchange.  We have heard nothing from Amazon and I feel like I should have purchased through a more reputable distributor like William Sonoma.  I would like to know the status of my return and know if a replacement machine has been shipped.  I could have reordered this product and had it delivered by now.  This process began 2/17/22

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: Nice machine but noisy; hot water dispenser and frothing wand are messy
Review Description: We've had the machine for a few months and really enjoy the flavor and quality of the coffee drinks that we can make.  Our only complaints:1) the pump for the extraction process started squealing for a few seconds at startup; started doing this 1-2 weeks after we started using it;2) the hot water dispenser seems to be a pulse-type pump and sends short bursts of hot water into the cup for making coffees or teas;  once the cup starts getting full, the beverage splashes out of the cup until the dispenser is turned off.3) the frothing wand operates much the same way - if not careful, the spurting steam can splash hot liquid on your hand.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: Great coffee maker / Terrible espresso machine
Review Description: This is a great coffee maker is your Mr. coffee drip pot fails. But if you want a nice cup of espresso then go to your local coffee shop. The machine does not make a proper cup of an espresso, I have been making espresso and roasting my own beans for years. Also fault in the machine is that every time you make a cup of coffee water leaks out of the bottom. Read multiple reviews on how to fix this and I would have to go buy a piece. I own this espresso machine for less than one week and I’m not about to go buy something else to fix a brand new machine.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: Purchased this machine around a month ago and so far so good. The machine works as advertised and it is less messy than other brands at same price point where you need to use a manual tamper. Makes great cappuccino and espresso and so far I am very happy with my purchase. At the beginning we were struggling to build up the pressure to the optimum zone, but after changing the beans, I am getting perfect pressure consistently. Definitely recommend it to everyone.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: Amazing but broke after 6 months. See edit.
Review Description: This machine undoubtedly makes the very best espresso coffee I have ever tasted. The problem is that the machine is very likely to break down and it will cost you a lot of time, money and effort to get it periodically repaired.The integrated grinder stopped working after only 6 months. I now realize that the machine looks amazing on the outside but the manufacturing and engineering quality of the components inside is poor. So if you are willing to spend $700 for a great espresso machine be prepared to spend a lot more regularly to keep it running. It’s a shame because it should be awesome and reliable given the high cost.Added info! So I replaced it with the Gevi Gecme403-u which costs $99.00. It is amazing with lots of crema. Just buy a separate grinder.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: Perfect cup of coffee every time!
Review Description: We purchased this for our family Christmas. We never need to visit a coffee shop again. The coffee is delicious,  machine is easy to operate and clean. Worth every penny.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: The first coffee maker was a lemon. The pressure gauge was not working. Amazon replaced it. It broke after first descale cycle. Delonghi is impossible to get on hold off, customer service has been shut down.Stay away from this brand.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: I promise you i don’t write a review very often.. but this machine is a killer when it come to your morning coffee. It will take you few try’s to master your caffeine dose but even trying with no knowledge still a good cup of coffee.Its not the coffee beans what make the difference, its right grinds, dose & temperature what makes it great.Now i deal with morning traffic with big smile on my face.Thank you guys

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: I like this brand. They have great customer service. However, this machine is a bit complicated to get a cup of espresso especially in the morning. Too many steps to make a cup of espresso. If you have patience and like to play a barista, this machine might be for you.  It is very beautiful.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: pretty cool machine.  it is all metal--no plastic exterior pieces.  customizable, we like using extra hot selection as normal selection not hot enough.  does not fit under cabinet as bean holder sticks up too high.  once you put beans in holder, cannot remove until all beans gone so would not convenient to grind beans for just one cup.  it's heavy too so you wouldn't want to be moving it around.  easy to clean the milk frother--goes on and off easily.  very happy with the purchase

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: Machine produces inconsistent coffee doses. The only way it will fill the filter to correct dosing is have the grind all the way to #1 setting and the dose knob turned all the way to the right. The frothing wand times out too early while frothing so forget a extra hot froth. The machine leaks water on occasionally from the bottom filling my counter top with water.  When I bought it, it would not froth milk, and when I investigated found it was missing internal parts/ gaskets in the wand. This machine is junk and I’m sorry I bought it.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: I used to be a basic coffee b!&$@.My morning routine used to be to grind beans, and make pour over coffee. Then my wife and I had a baby (She is now 4 months old at the time of this post) and my coffee routine just wasn’t working anymore. And honestly, it wasn’t the best cup of coffee either . Enter La Specialista.... it is a true game changer, time saver, best cup of coffee maker, perfect espresso shot pourer.... true life changer. I couldn’t be happier with the quality and level of satisfaction I get with my morning coffee now. Do yourself a favor and upgrade your morning with La Specialista! You will not regret your decision.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: I was scared to upgrade at first but honestly this machine is amazing. Super easy to use, installing was super quick. I use different kind of beans and once you get the right setting you will get amazing espressos and lattes. It is a touch pricey but you won't buy another cup of coffee at your local shop, this is the same (if not higher) quality!

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: It broke after using it for 2 weeks
Review Description: DO NOT PURCHASE THIS ESPRESSO MACHINE!!!I purchased and used for a gathering, after making several cups of espresso for my guests the machine stopped working.We went through all trouble-shooting and cleaning of the machine and it still would not work.This is not worth the money you pay for a nice espresso machine

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: This $800 Espresso maker broke after only 16 months of use! They no longer make the part and shipped us a refurbished machine. This is standard policy. After paying $800 for a machine I would expect something better than someone else's used and fixed machine. I will not be purchasing another De'Longhi product!!!

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: I would have given it a 5 star if it weren't for the milk frother. I like it, but I find myself frothing 1 1/2 times. The frother isn't consistent and requires disassembly and cleaning.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: Poor quality. Very poor customer service
Review Description: Like the built in grinder with tapper but poor quality.Product received with missing components. Requested twice to get the right replacement components.Custom brew "My" feature does not work. Had to take time off from work to video chat with customer service during business hours. Sent product back to manufacture for repair. Has been weeks without updated status. Request for a replacement is not an option.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: Bad purchase on 2nd Machine for home
Review Description: I had this product for  2weeks,  started leaking water all over my counter top,  now the frothed doesn’t not work.  I fell and hurt my self pretty bad and have not gotten back with De’longhi yet.  When it was delivered by amazon it was thrown over the fence and leaning on the side.  Not happy with delivery or product!  I bought one 2 weeks or so prior to buying this one at Best Buy and it works fine.  As soon as I am on my feet again I will deal with amazon delivery methods and De’ Longhi.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Description: My family friggen lives this machine! Coffee is much better out of this machine than any other I've owned. Down side is that it only stands up to around 120 deg., so you have to turn the steam off and turn it right back on top get it any higher.

Product Title: De'Longhi La Specialista Espresso Machine with Sensor Grinder, Dual Heating System, Advanced Latte System & Hot Water Spout for Americano Coffee or Tea, Stainless Steel, EC9335M
Review Title: Couldn't be happier.  Nicer than expected.
Review Description: I love this machine.  Great espressos and Americanos.  Only complaint is the narrowness of the water tank-a little hard to install water filter.
